summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2348 for the improvement of Lane Street, from Thirtieth Avenue South to Thirty-fourth Avenue South; Thirty-first Avenue South, Thirty-second Avenue South and Thirty-third Avenue South, each from King Street to Lane Street, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, concrete stairways and wooden crosswalks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 24346, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
